name: Box Bot
description:
What happens when you give a robot a grappling hook and throw it in a warehouse running out of space?

Features:

-Infinite Running

-Upgrade Shop

-Powerups

-Grappling Hook

-Two Different Map Generation Styles

-Ultimate Box Destruction

Upgrades:

-Speed

-Jump Height

-Wall Jump Height

-Grappling Hook Range

-Box Breaking Power

Videos:

https://vimeo.com/284578305

https://vimeo.com/284576784

Controls:

Space - Jump/Wall Jump(When Moving Into A Wall And Falling)

A/D - Move Left/Move Right

W/S - Control Grapple Length

Shift - Max Speed

Control - Low Speed

Left Click - Shoot Grappling Hook

Right Click - Remove Grappling Hook

Tips:

-You break through boxes by running into them with high enough speed.

-You purchase upgrades with the coins found around and inside the coin-marked boxes.
